definition: royal family/imperial household/member of the royal family
room/work unit/grave/scabbard/family or clan/one of the 28 constellations of Chinese astronomy

sentences.english: Thee love of royal celebrities has always been staged for the world to see.
sentences.chinese: 皇室名流们的爱情总是如戏剧般上演，受到世人瞩目。

sentences.english: It is said that it is the symbol of British Royalty and built in 1087.
sentences.chinese: 据说伦敦塔是英国皇室的象征，建于1087年。

sentences.english: The dragon was closely connected to the royal family.
sentences.chinese: 龙与皇室家庭有着密切的关系。

sentences.english: The change of this system was closely connected to the religious believes of the Royal house and its material interests.
sentences.chinese: 度牒制度变迁与皇室家族信仰倾向及其利益关系密切。

sentences.english: 20am : Members of foreign royal families arrive at the Abbey from Buckingham Palace.
sentences.chinese: 国外皇室成员抵达教堂。

sentences.english: If you said, "What is English?", the Royal Family are.
sentences.chinese: 如果你说，“什么是英国？”答案就是皇室。

sentences.english: The Japanese Imperial family patronises the Japanese Art Association.
sentences.chinese: 日本皇室资助日本艺术协会。

sentences.english: The thrid chapter analyses the effects and substances of the special status of royal women.
sentences.chinese: 第三章探讨了皇室女性特殊地位的影响和实质。

sentences.english: The royal family found out and disavowed him.
sentences.chinese: 皇室发现后就来阻止他。

sentences.english: We dined with royalty, heads of states, authors, and activists.
sentences.chinese: 我们和皇室，政府首脑，作家，社会活动家一起吃饭。

sentences.english: In European cultures it is traditional for women to curtsey in front of royalty.
sentences.chinese: 在欧洲传统中，女性会向皇室成员行屈膝礼。

sentences.english: He was made Bishop of Hippo Regius in 395.
sentences.chinese: 在395年，他成为希波皇室的主教。

sentences.english: British England Royal Wedding, William and Kath.
sentences.chinese: 英国皇室婚礼，威廉王子和平民公主凯特。

sentences.english: Originally, the Wookiees were supposed to help the Rebels conquer an Imperial bunker.
sentences.chinese: 最初，吾基人应该去帮忙瑞博人征服皇室炮楼。

sentences.english: Did you know that Dachshunds were a favorite breed among Royalty?
sentences.chinese: 你是否知道腊肠犬曾经是皇室成员所钟爱的犬种呢？

sentences.english: Inbreeding seen to bring down Spain's Habsburgs.
sentences.chinese: 近亲结婚将将西班牙哈普斯堡皇室引向衰退。

definition: the imperial court/the government in imperial times
imperial clan/member of the imperial clan/clansman/ancestral shrine
the emperor relatives (idiom); person with powerful connections
